name: Bloodbath (itch) (TizZy_228)
description:
A game created in less than ten hours, the idea of which arose from my childhood, when I did not have toys, I took a sheet of paper and drew a field on it and placed "soldiers". This is a demo version of the future game, there is no final graphics, sound and story part, but here the main gameplay is laid down (the game has only one scene - a scene for testing). I really want to get a lot of advice and suggestions about this demo, in order to create my first full-fledged game, which I will work on as long as it takes to turn it into a "candy", focusing on the opinion of gamers.

Controls:

  • [Esc] - Escape menu,
  • [W], [A], [S], [D] or arrows - Move,
  • [R] - Reload,
  • [LKM] - Shoot,
  • [Left Shift] + [LKM] - Accurate shoot.
